content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Li. I am open to discussing the rental price for the apartment. How much are you considering to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Heine. As a student, I'm looking for a place that's both affordable and comfortable. I've seen similar apartments in the area, and I'm hoping we can find a price that meets my budget. Would you be willing to start at 650 Euros per month?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: 650 Euros per month is a fair starting point, Mr. Li. I will consider your offer. Would you be willing to pay a bit more to secure this apartment? It's quite spacious and in a great location.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand that the apartment has attractive features, Mr. Heine. However, as a student, I need to be mindful of my expenses. Would you be able to lower the price to 625 Euros per month? This would be more in line with what I'm looking to spend.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: 625 Euros per month is a lower than I was hoping for, but considering your student status, I will meet you halfway. I agree to the price of 637.50 Euros per month. This is the lowest I can go to ensure a fair deal for both of us. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine
